addr: 506 South Grand Avenue Los Angeles, CA 90071
title: Asia/Pacific Business Outlook Conference 2016
desc: F AQs What are my transport/parking options getting to the event? Self-parking at the adjacent  Pershing Square  is $10.00 all-day, if you arrive before 11:00 am. Valet parking at the Biltmore is available at $45.00 per day for overnight guests. For participants who are not staying at the Biltmore, the charge will be $22.00 with events validation.  ? Where can I contact the organizer with any questions? Email: ciber@usc.edu; Tel: 213-740-7130 Is my registration/ticket transferrable? Yes, please send a written transfer request with the full name of the substituting person(s) to ciber@usc.edu or call us at 213-740-7130 What is the refund policy? Registration fee is fully refundable (minus a $35 processing fee) -- if cancellation is received by March 28, 2016; thereafter only substitutions will be permitted. What is the dress code at APBO? Business attire for all sessions, meals, and functions.
